Japanese text: 無理だと思っていた第一志望だったが、理良く合格することができた。
English text: It was my first choice, which I thought was impossible, but I was able to pass with ease.

Japanese text: 最高の気分だぜ。密かに想っている、藤崎詩織と同じ学校に入学できたんだから。
English text: It feels great. Because I was able to enroll in the same school as Shiori Fujisaki, who I secretly have feelings for.

Japanese text: 実は．．．。彼女とは小学校からの幼なじみで、家も隣りどうしなんだけれど．．．。
English text: actually. ．． ．． . She and I have been childhood friends since elementary school, and we live next door to each other. ．． ．． .

Japanese text: 俺と比べて、月とスッポン。だから、いまだに友達以上の関係には．．．。
English text: Compared to me, the moon and the soft-shelled turtle. That's why we're still more than friends. ．． ．． .

Japanese text: よう。何しけた面してんだよ。
